subject: Up to  one system will be awarded to the winner chosen by the Sun judging panel per monthly entry period  through June 2007.
body:
EDT) Join Scott McNealy and other executives as 
they present Sun's newest data management solutions and direction. Management 
Interfaces.
If you wanted to move your application to a 
different company's server, you had to throw out the corresponding storage array and 
buy a new server and storage unit. Sun is working on an iSNS server as an 
OpenSolaris project.
The OpenSolaris community is thriving with 
challenging projects and contributions.
If you wanted to move your application to a 
different company's server, you had to throw out the corresponding storage array and 
buy a new server and storage unit.
This enabled a customer to find the best server and 
then the best storage device, and it was likely that the two would talk. Look for 
course numbers WJB-110A, WJB-275A, WJB-310A, WJB-314A, and 
WJB-351A.
